maqras.text: 90|1|Ma'i sapata karaicho e'i nagarakhanara
90|2|arau tumi e'i nagarara adhibasi
90|3|sapata janmadatara arau yito si janma diche.
90|4|Nisandehe ami manuhaka srsti karaicho kathora dukha-kastara majata.
90|5|Si bhabe neki ye, ketiya'o tara oparata konorae'i ksamatabana naha’ba
90|6|si kaya, 'ma'i pracura dhana-sampada nasa karaicho'.
90|7|Si bhabe neki ye, kone'o taka dekha na'i
90|8|tara babe ami duta caku srsti karaa na'ine
90|9|ekhana jibha arau duta omtha
90|10|arau ami taka duta patha dekhuraa'icho.
90|11|Kintu si durgama giraipathata praraesa karaa na'i.
90|12|Arau tomaka kihe janaba ye, durgama giraipatha ki
90|13|se'ito haiche, dasamukti.
90|14|Athaba durbhiksara dinata khadyadana karaa
90|15|nikatatmiya etimaka
90|16|athaba daraidra-nispesita abharagrastaka
90|17|tara pichata si enelokara antarbhukta hai yaya yisakale imana aniche arau parasparaka dhairya dharana karaibalai upadesa diche arau upadesa diche parasparaka daya-anugraha karaibalai
90|18|e'omloke'i saubhagyasali.
90|19|Arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaiche, sihamte'i hatabhagya.
90|20|Sihamta abaraud'dha ju'ita paraibestita thakiba.
91|1|Sapata suryara arau tara poharara
91|2|sapata candrara yetiya i suryara pichata abirbhara haya
91|3|dinara sapata yetiya suryaka prakasa karae
91|4|raatira sapata yetiya i suryaka acchadita karae
91|5|sapata akasara arau se'i sattara yijane iyaka nirmana karaiche
91|6|prthiraira sapata arau yijane iyaka bistrta karaiche
91|7|sapata naphachara arau yijane iyaka subin'yasta karaiche
91|8|tara pichata iyaka tara satkamara arau asatkamara jnana dana karaiche
91|9|nisandehe siye'i saphala haiche yiye nijake paraitra karaiche.
91|10|Arau siye'i byartha haiche, yiye nijake kalusita karaiche.
91|11|Chamuda sampradaye abadhyatabasata asbikara karaichila.
91|12|Yetiya sihamtara majara hatabhagya byaktijana tatpara hai uthila
91|13|tetiya allahara raachule sihamtaka ka'le, 'allahara utajanika arau ta'ira pani khoraa samparke saradhana horaa'.
91|14|Kintu sihamte asbikara karaile arau utajanika badha karaile. Phalata sihamtara papara babe sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka samule dhbansa karai ekakara karai dile.
91|15|Arau te'om iyara parainamaka bhaya nakarae.
92|1|Sapata raatira, yetiya i acchanna karae
92|2|sapata dinara, yetiya i ujjbala haya
92|3|arau sapata se'i sattara, yijane nara arau narai srsti karaiche.
92|4|Niscaya tomalokara karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira.
92|5|Eteke konoba'i dana karaile arau takbaraa aralambana karaile
92|6|arau yi uttama taka satya buli grahana karaile
92|7|ami tara babe sahaja pathata cala sugama karai dima.
92|8|Arau konoba'i krpanali karaile arau nijake amukhapeksi bhabile
92|9|arau yi uttama taka asbikara karaile
92|10|ami tara babe kathina pathata cala sugama karai dima.
92|11|Arau tara sampada tara kono kamata nahiba, yetiya si dhbansa ha’ba.
92|12|Niscaya pathapradarsana karaatorae amara kartabya.
92|13|Niscaya amiye'i parakala arau ihakalara malika.
92|14|Eteke ami tomalokaka lelihana ju'i samparke satarka karai dicho.
92|15|Tata praraesa karaiba kerala se'i byakti yi ha’ba carama hatabhagya
92|16|Yiye asbikara karaiche arau mukha ghuraa'i laiche.
92|17|Arau iyara paraa duraaita rakha ha’ba parama muttakbi byaktika
92|18|yiye atmasud'dhira babe nija sampada dana karae
92|19|arau tara prati karao ene anugraha na'i yara pratidana diba lagiba
92|20|kerala tara mahana pratipalakara santustira pratyasata
92|21|arau anatipalame si santusti labha karaiba.
93|1|Purbahnara sapata
93|2|sapata raatira, yetiya i andhakaraacchanna haya.
93|3|Tomara pratipalake tomaka paraityaga karaa na'i arau asantusta'o horaa na'i.
93|4|Niscaya tomara babe parabarti samaya purbararti samayatakai uttama.
93|5|Niscaya anatipalame tomara pratipalake tomaka anugraha pradana karaiba, phalata tumi santusta ha’ba.
93|6|Te'om tomaka anatha arasthata poraa nachilane? Tara pichata teraemi tomaka asraya diche.
93|7|Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila pathaharaa arasthata, tara pichata toraemi tomaka pathanirdesa diche.
93|8|Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila sambalahina daraidraraupe, tara pichata teraemi abharamukta karaile.
93|9|Eteke tumi etimara (anathara) prati kathora naha’ba.
93|10|Arau bhikharaika dhamaka nidiba.
93|11|Arau tomara pratipalakara anugrahara katha pracara karaa.
